languages.text: "То есть вы просто смирились? Довольно... жалкий выбор".
"So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."
languages.original_text: "То есть вы просто смирились? Довольно... жалкий выбор".

traits.locale_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."
"So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."
"So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."
"So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

languages.text: “也就是说，你已经彻底放弃了吗？真是个相当……疯狂的选择。”
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你已经彻底放弃了吗？真是个相当……疯狂的选择。”

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿te has resignado? Es una elección... cobarde».
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿te has resignado? Es una elección... cobarde».

languages.text: 「では、お前は諦めたのか？それは…かなり卑劣な選択だ」
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: 「では、お前は諦めたのか？それは…かなり卑劣な選択だ」

languages.text: "Ihr fügt Euch also einfach? Eine recht ... feige Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr fügt Euch also einfach? Eine recht ... feige Entscheidung."

languages.text: « Donc... vous vous êtes simplement résignés à mourir ? C'est un choix plutôt... veule. »
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: « Donc... vous vous êtes simplement résignés à mourir ? C'est un choix plutôt... veule. »

languages.text: "Durumunu kabulleniyorsun yani, öyle mi? Bu bana biraz... Korkakça geldi."
languages.original_text: "So, you have simply resigned yourself? A rather... craven choice."

traits.locale_text: "Durumu kabullendin o hâlde, öyle mi? Sanki biraz... korkaklık etmişsin."
